awd_titl_txt: Engineering Research Equipment Grant:  Image Processing     Equipment for Watershed Analysis
awd_abstract_narration: This equipment grant is to improve the                                          capability for automatic image processing as                                    applied to research in watershed hydrology to                                   determine water retention characteristics of                                    basins, and to estimate runoff production.                                      Data extracted from maps of soil-type                                           distribution, topography, rainfall                                              distribution and land use, among other                                          information, will be used also to estimate the                                  potential of floods.  The image processing                                      equipment will be used in teaching students                                     and training researchers, and in implementing                                   algorithmic innovations, software development                                   and research progress.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: UNIVERSITY OF PITTSBURGH - OF THE COMMONWEALTH SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION
